text: Jörn Svensson (13 February 1936 – 12 November 2021) was a Swedish politician. He was a member of the Left Party. He was in the Riksdag from 1971 to 1988 and the European Parliament from 1995 to 1999. Svensson died on 12 November 2021 in Stockholm, Sweden at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish politicians Category:MEPs for Sweden
title: Jörn Svensson
